get.description: Returns all public courses, optionally filtered by year, term, limit and skip. Includes courses with the visibility "loggedIn" if user is authenticated/valid jwt is present and courses with the visibility "enrolled" if the user is authenticated and enrolled in that course.
Returns all semesters including the current one.

Returns all streams for a given course if course is public OR user is enrolled in course and course has visibility "enrolled" OR user is logged / valid jwt is present and course has visibility "loggedIn."
Returns all banner alerts (=system wide notifications).

delete.description: Removes an existing entry from the current user's list of active device tokens.

post.description: Adds a new deviceToken to the user's list of active device tokens.

get.description: Returns all feature notifications (=can be user-role specific).

get.summary: Get all chat messages of a stream
get.description: Returns all chat messages of a stream.

post.summary: Post a chat message to a stream
post.description: Posts a chat message to a stream.

get.summary: Get all polls of a stream
get.description: Returns all polls of a stream.

post.summary: Post a vote for an actove poll
post.description: Posts a vote for an active poll.

post.summary: Post a reaction to a chat message
post.description: Posts a reaction to a chat message.

delete.summary: Delete a reaction to a chat message
delete.description: Deletes a reaction to a chat message.

post.summary: Post a reply to a chat message
post.description: Posts a reply to a chat message.

delete.summary: Mark a chat message as unresolved
delete.description: Marks a chat message as unresolved.

put.summary: Mark a chat message as resolved
put.description: Marks a chat message as resolved.

get.description: Returns current user's watch progress of stream.

put.description: Updates current user's watch progress of stream.

get.description: Returns thumbnail path for a currently live stream, given a streamID if stream's course is public OR stream's course has visibility "loggedIn" and user is logged in / valid jwt is present OR stream's course has visibility "enrolled" and user is enrolled in stream's course.

Returns thumbnail path for a VoD, given a streamID if stream's course is public OR stream's course has visibility "loggedIn" and user is logged in / valid jwt is present OR stream's course has visibility "enrolled" and user is enrolled in stream's course.

Returns all currently live streams if stream's course is public OR stream's course has visibility "loggedIn" and user is logged in / valid jwt is present OR stream's course has visibility "enrolled" and user is enrolled in stream's course.

Returns a stream for a given streamID if stream's course is public OR stream's course has visibility "loggedIn" and user is logged in / valid jwt is present OR stream's course has visibility "enrolled" and user is enrolled in stream's course.

get.summary: Get the current user's administered courses.
get.description: Returns all courses that are administered by the current user.
Returns the bookmarks created by the current user, optionally filtered by stream.

put.description: Creates a new bookmark for the current user.

delete.description: Deletes a stream's bookmark (=timestamp) for the current user.

patch.description: Updates a bookmark of the current user.

get.description: Returns all courses in which the current user is enrolled in, optionally filtered by year, term, limit and skip.
Returns a user based on the JWT claims.

get.summary: Get the current user's pinned courses.
get.description: Returns all current user's pinned courses, optionally filtered by year, term, limit and skip.

post.summary: Add a course to the user's pinned courses.
post.description: Adds a course to the current user's pinned courses.

delete.description: Removes a course from the current user's pinned courses.
